name: Elephant Game DEMO
description:
This is the first playable build of my current Elephant-based project. Feel free to let me know if there are any bugs/broken things that occur while you play! It's a very short demo (should only take a few minutes to complete) so give it a shot if you feel like it! Controls:

A & D = Move & Swim Left/Right

W & S = Climb Up/Down Ladders & Swim Up/Down

W + A & D = Climb up adjacent 1-tile high blocks, assuming you're facing them and
close enough, and you're not swimming/climbing a ladder/falling

S = Lift object when facing liftable objects (mostly Pots, Chests, and Statue Pieces here), when close enough, and when standing on solid ground

S + Carrying liftable object = Place carried object down, assuming there is space for it in front of you in the direction you're facing

- Most liftable objects will despawn if moved from their starting locations, left behind in a room, or placed/dropped outside of a room. If you get stuck because you've placed blocks and trapped yourself, just wait for a minute! They should clear themselves out, and allow you to reset the room!

- Chests can be difficult to unlock. Applying a great deal of force to them can sometimes pop them open though.

- Some of our Elephant friend's current powers may be missing initially if/when I make a full game of this. However, they've decided that they can share a fraction of their true power for the sake of the demo.

I hope you all enjoy!
